Entries.Mon-2: I won a ton of championships back in high school. I bet you've never done that.
Entries.Wed-2: What, you want to play catch? What makes you think you're good enough to play with me?$u
Entries.Thu-2: Why don't you go work out or something? You could use it.
Entries.Fri-2: Did you get new pants? Not sure I'm a fan.#$e#Anyway, it's my day for pushups. See ya!
Entries.Sat-2: I did so many pushups yesterday and I got so sore...#$e#I bet my dedicated strength training easily stands up to your farm work.
Entries.Sun-4: Hey, @! You've been getting on my nerves so much I remember your name now.$a
Entries.summer_Mon-2: The beach is real nice this time of year.#$e#${You're looking burnt, you know.^I've been thinking you should get a swimsuit in a different color. Yours doesn't really suit you.}$
Entries.summer_Tue-2: What are you, some sort of nerd? I never see you outside catching these rays.
Entries.summer_Sun-2: Check out my new shoes! My old ones got dirty, so I threw them away.#$e#I would have donated them, but the idea of someone like you wearing my shoes weirded me out.#$e#...what?
Entries.fall_Sat-2: You better not be fishing all of the salmon out of the river. Save some for the rest of us!$a
Entries.fall_Sun-2: Hey, the gridball game is on today!$h#$e#Oh, I'm not trying to invite you to see it, though.$0
Entries.winter_Fri-2: Ugh, if only it was warm enough for sports outside.#$e#Not that I'd play with you, though.
Entries.winter_Sun-2: Oh yeah, there's gridball on today!#$e#$q 2275390/2275391 winter_Sun-2_followup#Do you root for the local team?#$r 2275390 0 winter_Sun-2_yes#Oh yeah!#$r 2275391 -20 winter_Sun-2_no#No, I root for another team...
Entries.winter_Sun-2_no: Yeah, figures. I don't have time for people who aren't loyal to the local team.$a
